value.title: CampusEvents Pro â€“ Event & Finance Management Platform
value.description: A college-focused event management platform built with the MERN stack to manage events end-to-end. Features include event creation and lifecycle management, participant registrations, hackathon team formation, role-based access control (RBAC), integrated budgeting and expense approval workflows, automated certificate generation, and downloadable financial reports.

value.title: Skill Scheduler
value.description: A productivity-focused full-stack web application designed to help students manage their study routines efficiently. Built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB, it allows users to create personalized schedules, set goals, manage tasks and exams, track progress, store categorized notes, and generate subject-wise quizzes.

value.title: Learner Routing - Multi-Section Platform
value.description: A versatile React and Tailwind CSS application featuring multiple sections including banking, cocktails, and food. The project demonstrates advanced routing capabilities and responsive design patterns across different content categories.

value.title: Tech Startup - Landing Page
value.description: A modern and responsive landing page for a tech startup built with pure HTML and CSS. The project showcases clean design principles, responsive layouts, and professional styling without any JavaScript frameworks.
